name: NameGame(LearningAboutLetters)
0:
”Alexa, open Name Game”
”Alexa, start Name Game”
”Alexa, launch Name Game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: name game
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Simply share your name and our explore the people, places, instruments, foods, etc. that start with the letters of a name!

Why it’s educational: This experience is about exploring different jobs, places, and even exotic food while reinforcing early letter recognition in a fun, engaging way!

For more screen-less, play-based learning, search "SayKid" on the Alexa Skill Store. By combining voice technology and real-world, tangible play, we help educators and families learn together in a safe, natural, and engaging way - without screens!

If you found the skill helpful, we greatly appreciate reviews!

Awards
- SayKid wins Grand Prize in the 2020 Alexa EdTech Competition 
- Harvard names SayKid a Finalist in the Saul Zaentz Early Education Competition
- SayKid wins MN Cup "Moonshot" Prize at US Bank Stadium
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
